messages.title: Three good reasons to back the Welsh Liberal Democrats
messages.content: 1) MORE NURSES - Ensure safe staffing levels across the Welsh NHS, putting more nurses in our hospitals and communities. 2) SMALLER CLASSES - Committed to delivering smaller class sizes in infant classes across Wales - providing more support to our children. 3) MORE JOBS FOR WALES - Creating an 'Opportunity Economy' that helps businesses grow and supports people to get on in life.

messages.title: Our priorities are your priorities
messages.content: We will put people first, which is why our priorities are your priorities: more nurses on hospital wards, smaller class sizes for our children, and an Opportunity Economy so that people can get on in life. Vote for Bob in Merthyr Tydfil & Rhymney, and for the Welsh Liberal Democrats on the regional list to make sure your voice is heard in the Assembly.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure safe staffing levels across the Welsh NHS, putting more nurses in our hospitals and communities.
Committed to delivering smaller class sizes in infant classes across Wales - providing more support to our children.
Creating an 'Opportunity Economy' that helps businesses grow and supports people to get on in life.

contactInformation.address: 2 Mitchell Cress, Penydarran, Merthyr Tydfil, CF47 9UB.

endorsements.endorsement: Leader of the Welsh Liberal Democrats
